comments.body: Obviously selling hacked or carded accounts or more likely just a scam.  Same guy (or his twin brother) been scamming around under multiple names scamming the same stuff.Account with $500 gift card balance for $150 .... yea sure.Very obvious other accounts (and more I'm sure) include:Dennis2221StevehellinkeanuReeves17NoxAccounts
